lead_paragraph: Olympic organizers will bring typical Brazilian informality to the medal ceremonies at Rio2016 with three different kinds of podium music depending on whether the sports are considered classical, pop or cool, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Olympics: Funky or Classic? Medal Ceremony Gets Musical Makeover
headline.main: Olympics: Funky or Classic? Medal Ceremony Gets Musical Makeover
